column2: This ghoul was changed from an average mortal into a castle wall of flesh and bone.
Bloodthirsty and ferocious, this ghoul's only purpose is to rip apart its master's foes.
Through the use of Vicissitude, use your fleshcrafting abilities to change a ghoul into a weapon of war, or prime breeding stock for your revenants.
You have decided to acquire a mortal and offer them your vitae. With the end goal of changing them through Vicissitude towards your own ends.
I require a proper defender of my forces
Let it be my wrath, in flesh and bone
A prime specimen is needed for my revenant families
With Vicissitude an experienced crafter can sculpt the flesh and bone of a subject, making them a creature of alien beauty or gnarling them into a deformed monstrosity.
Arise ghoul, there is work to be done
